recipes.name: Simple Omelette Recipe
recipes.description: An easy and quick dish, perfect for any meal. This classic omelette combines beaten eggs cooked to perfection, optionally filled with your choice of cheese, vegetables, or meats.
ingredients: Optional fillings: cheese, diced vegetables, cooked meats, herbs

instructions.description: In a bowl, beat the eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper until they are well mixed. You can add a tablespoon of water or milk for a fluffier texture.

recipes.name: Tiktok Chicken Cobbler
recipes.description: An easy and delicious comfort food caserole to keep you warm though the winter months. This classic caserole combines chicken, veggies, a creamy soup and topped with biscuit batter, ideally from Red Lobster but any yummy batter will do! This is one you can make your own!
ingredients: 16 oz bag of frozen vegetable medley
1 (11-ounce) box of Cheddar Bay Biscuit mix
1 cup taco cheese blend or shredded cheddar cheese
1(10.5 ounce) can cream of chicken soup

instructions.action: Gather the ingredients, preheat oven to 350 F
instructions.description: Not to much to add here, just some set up.

instructions.action: Pour melted butter into caserole, scatter chicken on top.
instructions.description: Best to use a 9x13 size caserole but whatever works and is oven safe.

instructions.action: Whisk together the biscuit mix, cheese and italian dressing
instructions.description: Everything should be poured on top of the previous layer,no mixing yet.

instructions.action: Whisk together the cream of chicken, chicken broth
instructions.description: Pour ontop of the biscuit mix but still dont mix together.

instructions.action: Put in oven, let sit for 10 minutes, enjoy!
instructions.description: Control yourself as your home starts smelling delicious. The pay off will be worth it!
